content:
path /v3/bcash/block/hash
operationId BchGetBlock
parameters
description Block hash or height
in path
name hash
required True
schema
type string
summary Get Bitcoin Cash Block by hash
description 5 credits per API callGet Bitcoin Cash Block detail by block hash or height
responses
200
BchBlock
type object
properties
hash
type string
description Hash of block
size
type number
description Block size
height
type number
description The number of blocks preceding a particular block on a block chain
version
type number
description Block version
merkleroot
type string
description The root node of a merkle tree a descendant of all the hashed pairs in the tree
tx
type array
description List of transactions present in the block
BchTx
type object
properties
type number
vin
type array
items
type object
properties
type number
scriptSig
properties
type string
type object
vout
type array
items
type object
properties
type number
scriptPubKey
properties
type string
addresses
type string
type object
time
type number
description Time of the block
nonce
type number
description Arbitrary number that is used in Bitcoins proof of work consensus algorithm
type number
confirmations
type number
description Number of blocks mined after this block
previousblockhash
type string
description Hash of the previous block
nextblockhash
type string
description Hash of the next block
description OK
